info.title: Zoho Sign
info.description: Zoho's Sign is a complete digital signature app that helps digitally sign business documents with complete security and reliability

get.description: Specify the account details to get to know the account details of the current user

created_time.description: Displays the time when the account was created

account_id.description: This field displays the ID of the particular account

ZSOID.description: This field displays the Zoho Sign User ID of the particular account

created_time.description: Displays the time the document was created

user_email.description: Shows the email id of the particular user

user_id.description: Shows the user id of the particular user

last_name.description: Displays the Last Name (if provided) of the user

first_name.description: Displays the First Name of the user

items.description: Shows the total number of users assosicated.

post.summary: Invite the users whom you want to join

parameters.name: email_id
parameters.description: Enter the email ids of all the invitees whom you want to to be added inside square bracket

get.description: Helps to fetch the list of users who are associated with the account

sort_column.description: Helps to sort the column based upon the parameter that is given.

has_more_rows.description: Status of the other available rows

sort_order.description: Helps to sort either in ascending/descending order

row_count.description: Displays the number of rows present in the list.

user_email.description: Displays the email id of the user

put.summary: Update the user access and roles of Zoho Sign users
put.description: You can update the access and role of a Zoho Sign User, one at a time

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.x-ms-summary: Zoho Sign ID of the user
parameters.description: Zoho Sign ID of the user

parameters.name: allowed_access
parameters.x-ms-summary: Is allowed to access Zoho Sign ?,
parameters.description: Is allowed to access Zoho Sign ?

parameters.name: role
parameters.x-ms-summary: Role of the user to be updated,
parameters.description: Role of the user to be updated

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.x-ms-summary: Zoho Sign ID of the user to be removed
parameters.description: Zoho Sign ID of the user to be deleted

parameters.name: request_id
parameters.description: Request ID of the completed document

get.description: Downloads the particular document that is selected.

webhook_url.description: Enter the URL of the webhook

webhook_id.description: Enter the ID of the webhook

delete.description: Internal endpoint for deleting a webhook

total_pages.description: Total number of pages in the document

post.description: Register a callback for a particular event

get.summary: Form Data for all completed Requests
get.description: Form Data for all completed Requests

post.description: Send a reminder to recipients of a particular document.
An action to create a document for signing by uploading a file.

put.summary: Update the properties of a created request
put.description: Update the properties of a created request

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: Id of the request to be updated.

recipient_phonenumber.description: Phone Number of recipient for SMS mode of authentication.
recipient_phonenumber.title: Phone Number

recipient_countrycode.description: Country Code of recipient's phone number for SMS mode of authentication.
recipient_countrycode.title: Country Code

action_type.description: Select whether the recipient is a Signer or a viewer or an approver or an inpersonSigner.
action_type.title: ActionType

verify_recipient.description: Whether the recipient needs to be verified by one of the authentication modes.
verify_recipient.title: Need Authentication For Recipient

verification_code.description: 6 digit Verification Code for OFFLINE verification mode.
verification_code.title: Verification Code

expiration_days.description: Number of days left for the document to get expired.
expiration_days.title: Days to complete

is_sequential.description: Allow recipients to sign in the specified order.
is_sequential.title: Send in order

email_reminders.description: Enable periodic reminders for the recipients to sign the document.
email_reminders.title: Automatic reminders

reminder_period.description: Specify the time interval at which a reminder for signing is to be sent to the recipients.
reminder_period.title: Send a remainder every - (days)

post.description: Send the uploaded document out for signature

parameters.name: RequestId
parameters.description: Id of the request(document) to be sent out for signature.

get.description: Get the list of  document types available.
